title: League doesn't recognise G105 keyboard hotkeys
body:
Hi all

For some reason, League won't recognise the hotkeys of my Logitech G105 any longer.
G4 corresponds to F4 (warded ping) and G6 to F6 (mastery symbol).
Of course it's no big deal that I can't ping wards anymore, because who wards anyway, but me not being able to rub my sweet Level 7 Annie into the faces of my opponents is devastating.
Any idea what could be wrong? The keys work out of the game as they should, even when I change their function. So I think it's a problem w/ League.

replies.body: I installed the newest version from Logitech's website, it works now. I suppose it doesn't update automatically or whatever...
So apparently, I'm not the only one with this problem: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/77kfd0/free_talk_friday_october_20th/dool0mr/?context=3&st=j91gwpb4&sh=a8c77b3a

I'd first check for any software updates pertaining to that keyboard, and if that's not helping try rebinding the key to be functionally the same as the key you want it to hit. For example, rebind G4 to be detected as F4 while on Windows as well as in the game. 

(Let me know if that's not super clear to you XD)

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7Icp93r0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-20T01:18:39.890+0000)
>
> I'd first check for any software updates pertaining to that keyboard, and if that's not helping try rebinding the key to be functionally the same as the key you want it to hit. For example, rebind G4 to be detected as F4 while on Windows as well as in the game. 
> 
> (Let me know if that's not super clear to you XD)

That's the problem: I can't bind the key to G4 in the game, when I unbind "Enemey ward here" and press G4 to bind it, nothing happens. When I'm out of game and press G4, F4 happens.
